nodes.text: The Falko Run was a hyperlane running through the Centrality region of the Outer Rim Territories. Planets lying Rimward along the Falko Run included Ringneldia II, Dilonexa XXIII, Uaua, Paulking XIV, and Douglas III.
The Falko Run was connected to the more prominent Triellus Trade Route via the Cadma Conduit.
